title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText emits a 'ding' sound when SWT.MULTI is selected.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, a 'ding' sound (windows bell sound indicating an error) is heard.
EB: I expect no sound to be emitted when choosing SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Open ControlExampleText.  
2. Select the option SWT.MULTI.  
3. Observe the emitted 'ding' sound.
